column1: Sodhra is a town and Union council of Gujranwala District in the Punjab province of Pakistan. It is located at 32°28'0N 74°11'0E with an altitude of 222 metres (731 feet) and is part of Wazirabad Tehsil. The town lies on the left bank of the Chenab five miles east of the tehsil capital Wazirabad.
